sec.p: Several R [ 36] packages were used in this analysis: spatial indicators were calculated in RGeostats [ 37]; Dirichlet tessellae were calculated in spatstat [ 38]; generalized least squares fits were modeled in nlme [ 39]; while the relative importance of predictors and model averaged predictor estimates were calculated with MuMIn [ 40]. Time series autoregressive fits were modeled in PROC AUTOREG (SAS Institute Inc., Cary, NC, USA).
